resources.string: Rasputin supposedly cured the Tsar and Tsarina’s haemophiliac daughter Alexis.

Rasputin predicted his own death - “If I am killed by my own people, by the peasants, then you will continue to rule in peace and harmony. However, if I am killed by the noble class, then within two years, you and your children and all the royal family will be no more.”
Are you SURE you want to cheat?
Cheating is wrong. Hope you can live with that. You won the battle but lost the life war.
